definition: to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
component in Chinese characters/archaic variant of 毫[hao2]/archaic variant of 乙[yi3]
to roll steel (into sheets or bars)

sentences.english: The train conductor punched my ticket.
sentences.chinese: 火車檢票員在我的車票上軋洞。

sentences.english: A wise king winnows out the wicked; he drives the threshing wheel over them.
sentences.chinese: 智慧的王，簸散惡人，用碌碡輥軋他們。

sentences.english: In non-twist piercing the rolled billet is in compression stressed condition in trip-direction.
sentences.chinese: 無扭穿軋時，軋坯材料處於三向受壓應力狀態。

sentences.english: Seeing her getting into her car, I jogged after her and yelled, "Wait. " She ran over my foot.
sentences.chinese: 我大喊等等，她就開着車從我腳上軋了過去。

sentences.english: A wise king scattereth the wicked, and bringeth the wheel over them.
sentences.chinese: 智慧的王，簸散惡人，用碌碡輥軋他們。

sentences.english: The boy was nearly run over by a car.
sentences.chinese: 小男孩差一點兒被汽車軋了。

sentences.english: Push the potatoes through a sieve to make a puree.
sentences.chinese: 用漏勺軋土豆做成土豆泥。

sentences.english: He goes round in bad company and one day he'll be in trouble with the police.
sentences.chinese: 他軋壞道，因而總有一天會被警察抓進去的。

sentences.english: When I recovered a bit, I found a cockroach that had been squished by those wheels in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 醒來之後，眼前出現的是一隻被軋破肚皮的蟑螂。

sentences.english: The fracture appearance showed that ductile fracture happened during tests at elevated temperature.
sentences.chinese: 斷口形貌顯示，疊軋材料的高溫斷裂屬於韌性斷裂。

sentences.english: I was once run over by a car being pushed by two guys.
sentences.chinese: 有一次我被一輛車軋了，這輛車正由兩個人推着走。

sentences.english: Throwing a felt scarf after rolling the wool fibers initiates the fulling stage of wet felting.
sentences.chinese: 投擲軋後的羊毛纖維氈圍巾啓動階段的溼氈縮絨。

sentences.english: Industrial Filters is one of the world's largest suppliers of rolled filter media.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是世界上最大的軋過濾介質供應商之一。

sentences.english: Described in the article are the major technical parameters of the 3-high pipe rolling mill located at Heyang Steel Tube Co.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了衡陽鋼管有限公司三輥軋管機的主要技術參數。

sentences.english: The jaywalker was run over by a truck.
sentences.chinese: 那個亂穿馬路的人被卡車軋了。

sentences.english: Refined copper and copper alloys, unwrought.
sentences.chinese: 未鍛軋的精煉銅及銅合金。

definition: to reject/to expel/to discard/to exclude/to renounce
to twist (strands into a thread)/to entangle/to wring/to hang (by the neck)/to turn/to wind/classifier for skeins of yarn
to manner of dancing/to walk around
hammer/to hammer into shape/weight (e.g. of a steelyard or balance)/to strike with a hammer
crotch/seat of a pair of trousers
